title: oc\files\cache\scanner gets wrong path
body:
hi,

using a fresh new oc6.0.0a install, debian 7.3.
some files presents on the filesystem aren't visible using the web interface.
owncloud logs gives me : 

```
debug	 oc\files\cache\scanner	 !!! path 'files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/files/www/owncloud-data/myuser/fi' is not readable !!!
``` 

my owncloud install is in /var/www/owncloud.
data directory is /var/www/owncloud-data.

guess something is wrong with the scanner path.
